title: Sasaki-san is just a little bit amazing
description:
When I confessed my love to Sasaki-san... she's floating!? But only by 1 cm off the ground...!
From the novel posting site "monogatary.com," a mysterious youthful romantic comedy about Sasaki-san, who can use a little bit of amazing magic, and me! (From Comic-action)
author: Satou Mashiro
